text: Mezhdu nimi yest' takiye, kotoryye zhelayut slushat' tebya: no My polozhili pokryvala na serdtsa ikh i glukhotu v ushi ikh, chtoby oni ne ponimali yego. Yesli oni uvidyat vse znameniya, ne poveryat im; tak chto, kogda pridut k tebe, budut sporit' s toboy i skazhut te, kotoryye ne veruyut: "On - tol'ko basni o prezhnikh lyudyakh
